item.description:
I have 15 Quantum of Solace passes that invites 2 each enough for 30 movie members to group up where I will be standing at 6:15pm next to the Ticket man.


I say 6:15pm because there will be a huge line forming up and I want all of us to get in line just in time. We'll head up at 6:30pm so we can all get in line for the 7:00pm Quantum of Solace movie. The Manager of Lowell Theater has spoken to me over the phone that you could only get in with the original movie pass.

Any questions, just call me at my cellphone: 617-435-8177

Windsor
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Sedona Greenish Cap standing next to the Ticket guy
item.name: Quantum of Solace - James Bond - 15 Original Passes here
